scripts.start: sh -c 'export $(cat .env | sed "s/#.*//g" | xargs) && sh substitute_variables.sh index.src.html && elm-live src/Main.elm --dir=./ --open --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8080 --pushstate --start-page=index.src.html -- --output=./assets/inline/bundle.js'
scripts.precommit: npm run format-validate && npm test && npm run review
scripts.precommit-fix: npm run format-fix-all && npm test && npm run review-fix-all
